"I want them converted to jamming beacons, then we'll place them at 
strategic points to knock out all enemy communications and sensor 
scans," Devilcat explains.  "Right now, though, we have to resolve 
some border troubles of our own.  Anyone know where our intruder got 
to?"

Fury, still in beast form, prowls around.  "I can smell something 
unnatural besides us.  He's here somewhere - whoever he is."

Torin transforms to robot form, having a better idea.  "Let's see; if 
I uplink my computer to Rogue Star's sensor array, I should be able 
to nail down the Maximal's location ... Gatara, take two steps to 
your left, turn around, and start shooting."

Gatara blinks, then follows the suggestion - which puts Yggdrasil 
dead center in her crosshairs when she pulls the trigger on her 
machine gun!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Don't move, the huge tree bot thought to himself. A single move and 
> they all start to fire at you.
> 
> Yggdrasil looked continued to listen, swearing inside and hoping 
those 
> guys weren't too curious. He wanted to know more about the Maximals 
> and their whereabouts, but he could do nothing until these guys 
talked 
> of the subject or went away.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Noir --
> > 
> > Noir nods her approval of Gatara's work. "Well done Gatara, this 
> > should definately be an obvious hint for future enemies." She 
scans 
> > the rest of the Rogues where were also gazing appraisingly.
> > 
> > Noir then remembers her and Torin's mission before being summoned 
> > outside, "Devilcat,  Torin and I have collected as many of those 
> > communicator beacons that we could find. They are located in a 
> > container near the entrance to the storage bay. Where do you want 
> > them?"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Torin ambles after her.  When they get outside, they find 
Devilcat 
> > > and Riekan already there.  Jayde and Fury arrive soon after.  
The 
> > > thunder of jets soon announces Gatara's arrival as well.
> > > 
> > > "Ah, there you are." Devilcat says to the group in 
> > general.  "Gatara, 
> > > may I assume everything went smoothly?"
> > > 
> > > "Got their heads on poles and their bodies blown away."  
Gatara's 
> > > description matches her usual notion of proper corpse disposal -
 
> > put 
> > > the head on display and disintegrate the rest.  It's a loud and 
> > clear 
> > > message not to mess with the Rogues.
> > > 
> > > OOC: Anyone who wants can stumble across this grisly exhibit in 
> > the 
> > > future.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > > -- Noir --
> > > > 
> > > > "Alright." Noir says. "We'll leave the beacons here and get 
them 
> > > > after the situation is resolved."
> > > > 
> > > > She heads out of the storage bay, and starts making her way 
out 
> > of 
> > > > the Rogue Star with a quick pace.
